price: Ṣé wọ́n ń lérò pé (bí) A ṣe ń fi dúkìá àti ọmọ nìkan ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún wọn,
arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّمَا نُمِدُّهُم بِهِۦ مِن مَّالٖ وَبَنِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: ayaḥsabūna annamā numidduhum bihi min mālin wabanīna
